name: Color Vortex Tube
description:
Color Vortex Tube is a relaxing, simple game for everyone!

Roll inside the road tube, color switch and pass as many obstacles as you can!
Color Vortex Tube is a combination of beautiful colors, relaxing music and smooth game-play.
Run fast inside the color road tunnel and try to last as long as you can.

Each time you pass an obstacle you switch color.
Drag left or right to roll inside the color tunnel and pass the obstacles that have the same color as yours. Watch out, if you hit a different color you will lose!

The further you travel the harder the obstacles will become, rolly obstacles, moving rails and spiky terrains will try to make you lose! How far can you go?
